item.description:
For those that want to start the evening a little differently, Providence Roller Derby is holding their final bout of the season on Friday night at the Bank of America skating center (eg: Kennedy Plaza).

Amusingly, the hostess at Union Station Brewery (our new trivia night location) is on the Old Money Honeys squad. From descriptions of some friends and one of the refs, it's a fast paced game that is fun to watch.

Tickets at the door are $13, or you can purchase online at BrownPaperTickets. I believe that its cash-only at the door.


Meet at the upper end of the skating center steps, overpass on Exchange Terrace. (above the tunnel, across from the RhodeIsland Foundation, by the flags)

After the Bout is over, we can head to a nearby pub for drinks/dancing/whatever anyone is interested in.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll find some clever way to identify myself...8)
item.name: Providence Roller Derby
